scripts.dev:desktop: concurrently -k -n vite,electron "npm run dev -w packages/desktop" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 npm run start -w packages/desktop"
scripts.dist:win: npm run build -w packages/desktop && electron-builder --win --publish never --projectDir packages/desktop
scripts.analyze:size: npm run build -w packages/desktop && npx source-map-explorer packages/desktop/dist/renderer/assets/index-*.js
